full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I GTOR CHOG DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I GTOR CHOG DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAM PAGONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG BYIN BRLABS CAN DU YOD BZHIN DU, YAN LAG BRGYAD LDAN GYI MTSO 'GRAM DU BA CHVA'I KHRON PA BRKOD NGAL BA 'DI 'DRA MA MI DGOS 'DUG KYANG DAD GAM DU GNAS PA'I MCHOD DPON BLO BZANG @006B 'PHRIN LAS KYIS, ,MGON PO'I MNGON RTOGS BSKANG BSHAGS BZLAS PA GTOR 'BUL BSTOD BSKUL SOGS CHA TSANG ZHING, ,TSIG NYUNG BRGYUN 'KHYER BYED RGYU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN GYIS BSKUL NGOR, BSKANG BSHAGS GNYIS RJE BLA MA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS MDZAD PA DANG, BSTOD PA NI RNYING BA GZHIR BZHAG ,GZHAN RNAMS TSIG SBYAR GSAR DU BGYIS TE, BTZUN GZUGS DHARMA BADZRA GYIS SKYID TSAL LA 'DI LA CHOS 'PHEL DU SBYAR BA'I DGE BAS YE SHES MGON PO'I RJES SU 'DZIN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
